hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: IMAGE_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Path to a raw disk image or a directory prefix. If a directory is specified, looks for dirname.img and attempts to inject AMI name in clovr.conf upon successful build

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: BUNDLE_TOOLS
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Bundle guest tools for VMware and Virtualbox

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd /mnt export BUILD_ID=$BUILD_ID if [ "$BUNDLE_TOOLS" = "true" ] then bundletools="-t" fi sudo -E /opt/vappio-util/vp-build $bundletools $IMAGE_NAME clovr-build #Runtime user-scripts echo "Enabling updates and hudson start at boot" buildname=`echo "$BUILD_ID" | sed 's/_/-/'` namepfx="clovr-build-$buildname" echo "build" > $namepfx/shared/node_type mkdir -p $namepfx/shared/user-scripts echo "#!/bin/bash" > $namepfx/shared/user-scripts/01-updaterecipes echo "/opt/vappio-install/vp-bootstrap-install" >> $namepfx/shared/user-scripts/01-updaterecipes echo "#!/bin/bash" > $namepfx/shared/user-scripts/02-starthudson #echo "export HUDSON_ARGS=\"--argumentsRealm.passwd.admin=cb2clovr3 --argumentsRealm.roles.admin=admin\"" >> $namepfx/shared/user-scripts/02-starthudson echo "/etc/init.d/hudson start" >> $namepfx/shared/user-scripts/02-starthudson echo "/etc/init.d/apt-cacher restart" > $namepfx/shared/user-scripts/04-aptcacher echo "/var/lib/gems/1.8/gems/irc_cat-0.2.0/bin/irccat -c /etc/irccat.yml &" > $namepfx/shared/user-scripts/05-irccat chmod a+x $namepfx/shared/user-scripts/* perl -pi -e 's/numvcpus = \S+/numvcpus = "2"/' $namepfx/start_clovr.vmx perl -pi -e 's/memsize = \S+/memsize = "8192"/' $namepfx/start_clovr.vmx tar -cvzf $namepfx.tgz $namepfx || true
